verses.verse: Then <S%H7725>again<s%> I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%>, <S%H5774>and<s%>, behold, a flying <S%H4039>roll<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7200>me<s%>, What seest <S%H559>thou<s%>? And I answered, I <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H5774>flying<s%> <S%H4039>roll<s%>; the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof is <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he unto <S%H423>me<s%>, This is the curse that goeth <S%H3318>forth<s%> over the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the whole <S%H776>land<s%>: for every one that <S%H1589>stealeth<s%> shall be cut <S%H5352>off<s%> on the one side <S%H3644>according<s%> to <S%H7650>it<s%>; and every one that sweareth shall be cut <S%H5352>off<s%> on the other side according to <S%H3644>it<s%>.

I will cause it to go <S%H3318>forth<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, and it shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H1590>thief<s%>, and into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of him that <S%H7650>sweareth<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%> by my <S%H8034>name<s%>; and it shall <S%H3885>abide<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and shall <S%H3615>consume<s%> it with the <S%H6086>timber<s%> thereof and the stones <S%H68>thereof<s%>.

Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me went <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5375>me<s%>, Lift up now thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%> what is this that goeth <S%H3318>forth<s%>.

And I <S%H559>said<s%>, What is <S%H559>it<s%>? And he said, This is the <S%H374>ephah<s%> that goeth <S%H3318>forth<s%>. He <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H5869>moreover<s%>, This is their appearance in all the <S%H776>land<s%>

(and <S%H5375><s%>, behold, there was lifted up a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H5777>lead<s%>); and this is <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3427>sitting<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H374>ephah<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, This is <S%H7564>Wickedness<s%>: and he <S%H7993>cast<s%> her down into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H374>ephah<s%>; and he <S%H7993>cast<s%> the <S%H68>weight<s%> of <S%H5777>lead<s%> upon the mouth <S%H6310>thereof<s%>.

Then lifted I <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%>, <S%H3318>and<s%>, behold, there came forth <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>women<s%>, and the <S%H7307>wind<s%> was in their <S%H3671>wings<s%>; now they <S%H2007>had<s%> <S%H3671>wings<s%> like the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of a <S%H2624>stork<s%>; and they lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H374>ephah<s%> between <S%H776>earth<s%> and <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> I to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with <S%H3212>me<s%>, Whither do these bear the <S%H374>ephah<s%>?

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1129>me<s%>, To build her a <S%H1004>house<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar<s%>: and when it is <S%H3559>prepared<s%>, she shall be <S%H3240>set<s%> there in her own <S%H4369>place<s%>.
